hero.title: Build Your Next Project Faster
hero.subtitle: A production-ready Next.js boilerplate with authentication, payments, and more

features.title: Everything You Need
features.subtitle: All the tools and integrations to build and scale your application

authentication.title: Authentication
authentication.description: Secure authentication with Better Auth, supporting email/password and social providers

payments.title: Payments
payments.description: Integrated payment processing with Polar for subscriptions and one-time payments

database.title: Database
database.description: PostgreSQL with Drizzle ORM for type-safe database operations

storage.title: File Storage
storage.description: Cloudflare R2 integration for scalable object storage

email.title: Email
email.description: Transactional emails with Resend for user notifications and updates

monitoring.title: Monitoring
monitoring.description: Error tracking and performance monitoring with Sentry

cta.title: Ready to Get Started?
cta.subtitle: Join thousands of developers building with our boilerplate
